name: unialeph

body.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(crn(cale)), con0)
-| wn(wcel(cuni(crn(cale)), con0))
-| wo(wcel(cuni(crn(cale)), con0), wceq(cuni(crn(cale)), con0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ⋃ ran(aleph)= On
⊣ ¬ ⋃ ran(aleph)∈ On
⊣ (⋃ ran(aleph)∈ On ∨ ⋃ ran(aleph)= On)

stmt.pretty: mpbi((⋃ ran(aleph)∈ On ∨ ⋃ ran(aleph)= On), Ord(⋃ ran(aleph)))

body.origin:
|- wo(wcel(cuni(crn(cale)), con0), wceq(cuni(crn(cale)), con0))
-| word(cuni(crn(cale)))
-| wb(word(cuni(crn(cale))), wo(wcel(cuni(crn(cale)), con0), wceq(cuni(crn(cale)), con0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (⋃ ran(aleph)∈ On ∨ ⋃ ran(aleph)= On)
⊣ Ord(⋃ ran(aleph))
⊣ (Ord(⋃ ran(aleph))↔(⋃ ran(aleph)∈ On ∨ ⋃ ran(aleph)= On))

comment: The union of the class of transfinite cardinals (the range of the aleph function) is the class of ordinal numbers. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2003.)
